name: Awakened Alok
skill: Creates a 5m aura that increases movement speed by 15% and restores 5 HP/s for 10s. Meanwhile, drops music notes every 25, which can be picked up by teammates and grant the same effect as the aura. Cooldown: 455.
identity: Using the power of music, Alok left Brazil and travelled the world. His name means "light".
